fields.description:
we have font awesome, let's use it!

replace gear with font awesome icon-ellipses-vertical
replace CSS help bubble with font awesome icon-question-sign
fields.summary: replace icons with font awesome icons

comments.body: Hey D, I found another icon that needs switching. The current refresh icon on the landing pages is completely stylistically out of sync with the rest of our icons. Can you change that out with the fontawesome icon-refresh, please? No box around it.

refresh looking (font) awesome now

note, this branch now includes GUI-1489's changes to get tests to pass.
UX review passed, ready for code review.
Need the selenium nav fixes pulled out of PR 1340 and placed in a distinct PR.
This branch will continue to require selenium fixes (beyond what is in GUi-1489) because this branch changes a tag that the tests depend on. The tests changed for this are far fewer.

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1347

Jenny, I think you're reviewed, but here's a 2nd chance! Pls send to Kamal after.
UX review already passed, ready for code review
need to update branch and create new PR.

noticed that loading icon bounces on the access policy generator like it did on the login page, needs fixing please!

Also saw bouncing icon on volume landing page. Should check all landing pages that have status changes for bouncer.
I went through a lot of things here... all dialogs, and grep'ed for other uses of busy where the problem occurs.
UX review already passed, if [~dkavanagh] fixed bouncing icons I mentioned as he said he did this should be ready for code review.
need to update this after GUI-1489 branch merges, then I'll pass to Kamal

This was previously code reviewed. If I don't hear back by the time tests pass, I'll send to Alice.

https://github.com/eucalyptus/eucaconsole/pull/1365

moving to In Review, swimlanes are messed up right now. [~kgill], please add any additional FA icons that you want to include to replace current Foundation icons (such as refresh) and then let's do a quick screenshare before moving to QA.
